doc.field: The Selah Strong Woodhull(1786-1826) account book consists of a single bound volume and spans the period 1818 to 1822, during which Strong was a minister at the Old First Reformed Church in Brooklyn.
The Selah Strong Woodhull(1786-1826) account book consists of a single bound volume and spans the period 1818 to 1822, during which Strong was a minister at the Old First Reformed Church in Brooklyn.

The Selah Strong Woodhull account book consists of a single bound volume and spans the period 1818 to 1822, during which Strong was a minister at the Old First Reformed Church in Brooklyn. The account book records transactions both personal (including purchases of shoes, clothing, fabric, etc.) and pertinent to official church business (such as payments for the rental or purchase of church pews).
Selah Strong Woodhull (1786-1826) served as a minister at the Old First Reformed Church in Brooklyn, New York from 1806 to 1825.
Source and date of acquisition unknown.
